DOC.brief_summary: This study is planned to evaluate the human factor (HF)/usability of pediatric or adolescent JIA patients and the caregivers of Juvenile Idiopathic Arthritis (JIA) patients with the Methotrexate Prefilled Pen (including a label comprehension assessment and a device robustness evaluation).
DOC.brief_title: Human Factors Study of Methotrexate Prefilled Pen (50 mg/mL) in Patients With Juvenile Idiopathic Arthritis
